for?"},{"text":""}]}],"mode":"simple"},"confirmMessage":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"acknowledgeMsg":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"optional":false,"defaultValue":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"withNluUserInput":true,"skipIfFulfilled":true,"entity":{"id":"","label":""},"variableId":"ef6351c16da941faa2a14e9f1cc826f3","skippable":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"inputType":{"format":"Text","script":""}},"1fb7a58c16b94dc589ea67cdc2b35ff8":{"id":"1fb7a58c16b94dc589ea67cdc2b35ff8","stepType":"ReusableTopic","name":"Search Catalog Item","fields":[],"reusableTopicChoice":"Search Catalog Item","reusableTopicId":"ccaacd71c3a3330012d1758a7ff57ecd","inputs":{"catalogs":{"value":"(function execute() {
 function getCatalogM2M(portalId){
 var gr = new GlideRecord('m2m_sp_portal_catalog');
 if (gr.isValid()) {
 gr.addActiveQuery();
 gr.addQuery('sp_portal', portalId);
 gr.addQuery('sc_catalog.active', true);
 gr.orderBy('order');
 gr.orderBy('sc_catalog.active');
 }
 else {
 gr = new GlideRecord('sp_portal');
 gr.addQuery('sys_id', portalId);
 }
 gr.setWorkflow(false)
 gr.query();
 return gr;
 }
 var suffix = vaVars.portalName;
 if (suffix) {
 var catalogs = "";
 var gr = new GlideRecord('sp_portal');
 gr.addQuery('url_suffix', suffix);
 gr.setWorkflow(false)
 gr.query();
 gr.next();
 var portalId = gr.getUniqueValue();
 vaVars.portalId = portalId;
 var m2mGR = getCatalogM2M(portalId);
 if (m2mGR.getRowCount() > 0) {
 m2mGR.next();
 catalogs += m2mGR.getValue('sc_catalog');
 while(m2mGR.next()){
 catalogs += ',';
 catalogs += m2mGR.getValue('sc_catalog')

 }
 }
 return catalogs;
 }
 return '';
})()
","mode":"script","type":"String"},"query_term":{"value":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":""},{"type":"datapill","dataPill":{"value":"{{vaInputs.search_term}}","displayValue":"vaInputs➛search_term"},"children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":""}]}],"mode":"simple","type":"String"},"result_limit":{"value":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":""},{"text":"5"},{"text":""}]}],"mode":"simple","type":"String"}},"outputs":[{"id":"c77cd068c67a474395b373f678d3dc60","value":"catalog_item_id","mapping":"catalog_item_id","preventDisable":true},{"id":"d65cbde442b148e3a4ab37d7260e88c2","value":"item_type","mapping":"item_type","preventDisable":false},{"id":"e9dde404b6af48a6a29a0d8f1e7a753c","value":"is_conversational","mapping":"is_conversational","preventDisable":true}],"variableIds":["c77cd068c67a474395b373f678d3dc60","d65cbde442b148e3a4ab37d7260e88c2","e9dde404b6af48a6a29a0d8f1e7a753c"],"outdatedNote":false,"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"b192f35530c946e1986cb8f2259cfa4c":{"id":"b192f35530c946e1986cb8f2259cfa4c","stepType":"Decision","name":"Decision"},"20a9a0d6dd4e46079b4c3c4d642a2ece":{"id":"20a9a0d6dd4e46079b4c3c4d642a2ece","stepType":"TextOutput","name":"Try Again","value":{"value":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":""},{"text":"Okay, Let's try again"},{"text":""}]}],"mode":"simple"},"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"secure":false},"7e841aab46a247d2ab48709ecabe51fd":{"id":"7e841aab46a247d2ab48709ecabe51fd","stepType":"Decision","name":"Decision"},"ad28b9f7adbe4da0af158cb34da618a8":{"id":"ad28b9f7adbe4da0af158cb34da618a8","stepType":"LinkOutput","name":"Link Output","url":{"value":"(function execute() {
 var item = new sn_sc.CatItem(vaInputs.catalog_item_id);

 if (item && item.getRecordClass() === "sc_cat_item_guide")
 return vaVars.baseUri + vaVars.portalName + '?id=sc_cat_item_guide&sys_id=' + vaInputs.catalog_item_id;
 
 return vaVars.baseUri + vaVars.portalName + '?id=sc_cat_item&sys_id=' + vaInputs.catalog_item_id;
})()","mode":"script"},"label":{"value":"(function execute() {
 var item = new sn_sc.CatItem(vaInputs.catalog_item_id);
 if (item) {
 var catItemJson = item.read({
 'name' : ''
 }, false);
 return catItemJson.name || '';
 }
 return '';
})()

Here are the details:"},{"text":""}]}],"mode":"simple"},"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"secure":false},"1fd4e572e0df410bbe0d8ca5956b72de":{"id":"1fd4e572e0df410bbe0d8ca5956b72de","stepType":"LinkOutput","name":"Inserted Record Link","url":{"value":"(function execute() {
 var tableName = vaInputs.record_table.getValue();
 var recordId = vaInputs.record_id.getValue();
 var screenId = '';
 if (vaVars.portalName === 'mesp') {
 var mobileDLink = new global.MobileDeepLinkGenerator('request');
 if (tableName == 'sc_req_item')
 screenId = '7516f9d787232300e0ef0cf888cb0b4d';
 else if (tableName == 'sc_request')
 screenId = '276dd3edb79033001befcd58de11a9c7';
 else if (tableName == 'incident')
 screenId = 'ebb94d9c0f2033001befa68ca8767e4e';
 else
 screenId = 'd39eb2db87772300e0ef0cf888cb0bcb';

 return mobileDLink.getFormScreenLink(screenId, tableName, recordId);
 }

 return vaVars.baseUri + vaVars.portalName + 
 "?id=ticket&table=" + tableName +"&sys_id=" + recordId;
})()
","mode":"script"},"label":{"value":"(function execute() {
 var message = '';
 var gr = new GlideRecord(vaInputs.record_table.getValue());
 gr.addQuery("sys_id", vaInputs.record_id);
 gr.query();
 if(gr.next()) {
 message = gs.getMessage('View submitted request ({0})', gr.getValue('task_effective_number'));
 }
 return message;
})()
